TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HttpCookieCollection extends System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase
Public NotInheritable Class HttpCookieCollection Inherits NameObjectCollectionBase

summary.span: Fornece uma maneira fortemente tipada de manipular cookies HTTP.

span.span: Provides a type-safe way to manipulate HTTP cookies.

remarks.format: ## Examples O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como ler os cookies usando o propriedade do de objeto e gravar cookies usando o propriedade do objeto.The following code example demonstrates how to read cookies using the property of the object and write cookies using the property of the object. Ambas as propriedades retornam objetos.Both properties return objects. Se qualquer um dos dois cookies denominado `userName` e `lastVisit` não estão na solicitação HTTP, em seguida, eles são criados na resposta HTTP.If either of two cookies named `userName` and `lastVisit` are not in the HTTP request, then they are created in the HTTP response. Se existirem dois cookies, as propriedades dos cookies que são exibidas.If the two cookies exist, the properties of the cookies are displayed. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.HttpCookieCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpCookieCollection/cs/HttpCookieCollection.cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.HttpCookieCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpCookieCollection/vb/HttpCookieCollection.vb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe .

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks O ASP.NET inclui duas coleções de cookie intrínseco.ASP.NET includes two intrinsic cookie collections. A coleção acessível por meio de contém cookies transmitidos pelo cliente para o servidor a `Cookie` cabeçalho.The collection accessible through contains cookies transmitted by the client to the server in the `Cookie` header. A coleção acessível por meio de contém cookies gerado no servidor e transmitidos para o cliente a `Set-Cookie` cabeçalho.The collection accessible through contains cookies generated on the server and transmitted to the client in the `Set-Cookie` header. ## Examples O exemplo a seguir cria um novo objeto de coleção do cookie e a preenche com os cookies recebidos do cliente.The following example creates a new cookie collection object and fills it with the cookies received from the client. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCookieCollection.HttpCookieCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookieCollection.HttpCookieCollection Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCookieCollection.HttpCookieCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookieCollection.HttpCookieCollection Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Add(class System.Web.HttpCookie cookie) cil managed

span.span: The to add to the collection.

summary.span: Adiciona o cookie especificado à coleção de cookies.

span.span: Adds the specified cookie to the cookie collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Qualquer número de coleções de cookie pode existir em um aplicativo, mas apenas a coleção referenciada por intrínseca o objeto é enviado ao cliente.Any number of cookie collections can exist within an application, but only the collection referenced by the intrinsic object is sent to the client. O método permite cookies duplicados na coleção de cookie.The method allows duplicate cookies in the cookie collection. Use o método para garantir a exclusividade de cookies na coleção de cookie.Use the method to ensure the uniqueness of cookies in the cookie collection. ## Examples O exemplo a seguir cria uma nova coleção de cookie e um novo cookie chamado "LastVisit", define o valor do cookie para a data e hora atuais e adiciona o cookie para a nova coleção.The following example creates a new cookie collection and a new cookie named "LastVisit", sets the value of the cookie to the current date and time, and adds the cookie to the new collection. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCookieCollection.Add Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookieCollection.Add Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCookieCollection.Add Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookieCollection.Add Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Returns an individual object from the cookie collection.

summary.span: Essa propriedade está sobrecarregada para permitir a recuperação de cookies por nome ou por índice numérico.

span.span: This property is overloaded to allow retrieval of cookies by either name or numerical index.

The specified by .

remarks.format: ## Examples O exemplo a seguir retorna cada cookie da coleção do cookie, verifica se ele é nomeado "LastVisit" e, se "LastVisit" for encontrado, atualiza o valor para a data e hora atuais.The following example returns each cookie from the cookie collection, checks whether it is named "LastVisit", and, if "LastVisit" is found, updates its value to the current date and time. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCookieCollection.Get1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookieCollection.Get1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCookieCollection.Get1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookieCollection.Get1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

param.span: O nome do cookie a ser recuperado da coleção.

summary.span: Retorna o cookie com o nome especificado da coleção de cookies.

span.span: Returns the cookie with the specified name from the cookie collection.
The specified by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Se o cookie nomeado não existir, esse método cria um novo cookie com esse nome.If the named cookie does not exist, this method creates a new cookie with that name. ## Examples O exemplo a seguir captura a coleção do cookie enviada pelo cliente em uma nova coleção de cookie, recupera o cookie chamado "LastVisit" da nova coleção e atualiza o valor do cookie para a data e hora atuais.The following example captures the cookie collection sent by the client into a new cookie collection, retrieves the cookie named "LastVisit" from the new collection, and updates the cookie's value to the current date and time. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCookieCollection.Get Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookieCollection.Get Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCookieCollection.Get Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookieCollection.Get Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Set(class System.Web.HttpCookie cookie) cil managed

span.span: The object to update.

summary.span: Atualiza o valor de um cookie existente em uma coleção de cookie.

span.span: Updates the value of an existing cookie in a cookie collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks O método primeiro verifica se um cookie já existe na coleção e o atualiza nesse caso.The method first checks to see if a cookie already exists in the collection and if so updates it. O método não permitir cookies duplicados na coleção de cookie.The method does not allow duplicate cookies in the cookie collection. Para adicionar cookies duplicados na coleção de cookie, use o método.To add duplicate cookies in the cookie collection, use the method. ## Examples O exemplo a seguir atualiza o valor de um cookie existente.The following example updates the value of an existing cookie. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpCookieCollection.Set Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookieCollection.Set Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpCookieCollection.Set Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpCookieCollection.Set Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
